title: Obama Posts Moving Comment On Humans Of New York Photo From Iran
content: Huffington Post Friday 4th September, 2015 , the creator of the well-known photo series, has temporarily rebranded his Facebook page as "Humans of Iran." His photo depicts a father and son on the child's tenth birthday.The father told Stanton a story about his son giving away apricots, which he says was the moment he knew he was raising a "humanitarian." ...
